channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: "Harris is going to win because she is currently covered in
item.description: "Harris is going to win because she is currently covered in stardust. And if there’s one thing Americans enjoy it’s stardust," writes Dylan Jones Read more: https://www.standard.co.uk//comment/kamala-harris-donald-trump-us-election-2024-b1178779.html

item.title: There are songs, dancing, a hint of romance, a touch of the
item.description: There are songs, dancing, a hint of romance, a touch of the macabre, a bit of sexiness and a lot of humour: everything you’d want from this sequel

item.title: He was one of 14 people arrested by police carrying out morn
item.description: He was one of 14 people arrested by police carrying out morning raids on Wednesday
